articles.title: "Xi Jinping's Real Mission Was To Get Me Fired": Ex Top US Official - NDTV
articles.description: In his book titled 'Never Give an Inch: Fighting for the America I Love,' former US Secretary of State Pompeo, 59, writes that he held multiple interactions with the Chinese leader and found him "dour" and a "quintessential Communist apparatchik".
articles.content:
Mike Pompeo recently resleade his book titled 'Never Give an Inch: Fighting for the America I Love'.

articles.author: Phillip van Niekerk
articles.title: PUTIN'S LITTLE AMERICAN HELPERS: AD2016, again and again: Arrest of senior FBI official puts focus on Russia's role in ascent of Trump - Daily Maverick
articles.description: The full extent of one of Russia’s most successful intelligence operations — helping to elect Donald Trump as President of the US — may never be known, but the blows to the credibility of America’s spy agencies are still coming.
articles.content: Last week, Charles McConigal, a former senior FBI official, was arrested and charged in a federal court in Manhattan for being in the pay of the Russian oligarch Oleg Deripaska, a man with deep ties … [+8669 chars]

articles.author: Stephanie Stacey
articles.title: Passengers endured a 13-hour flight to nowhere after their plane to New Zealand was forced to turn back - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: A long-haul Emirates flight turned back mid-flight because of flooding in Auckland. American Airlines passengers also endured a similar situation.
articles.content:
Passengers spent more than 13 hours flying onboard an Emirates aircraft only to land right back where they'd started. 
Flight EK448 departed from Dubai International Airport at around 10:30 on Frida… [+2153 chars]

articles.title: Outbreak of avian flu has killed more than 100 million birds and poses a serious threat of becoming a human pandemic - WSWS
